input_args.passage: "Giovanna d'Arco | Giovanna d'Arco (Joan of Arc) is an operatic dramma lirico with a prologue and three acts by Giuseppe Verdi set to an Italian libretto by Temistocle Solera, ..."
input_args.claim: "Thus, we can conclude that the opera Giovanna d'Arco was created by an Italian composer."
